pages.title: Golden Trevally
pages.text: The species predominantly occupies inshore waters where it inhabits both reef and sandy substrates.$(br2)It is known to grow to 120 centimetres ($(o)47 in$()) in length and 15 kilograms ($(o)33 lb$()) in weight.

pages.title: Golden Trevally
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
